 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵכָב‎</span> **proper name, masculine** (***band of riders?*** compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***camels used in journeying***); — 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangGreek">Πηχαβ</span>: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְהוֺנָדָב בֶּןרֿ‎</span> (Jehu's time, see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְהו‎</span>) [[2Kgs.10.15|2Kgs 10:15]]; [[2Kgs.10.13|2Kgs 10:13]], whose descendants [or, the members of whose society, [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 15</sup>, yet see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xi (1886). 171</sup>] were contemporary with Jeremiah, [[Jer.35.6|Jer 35:6]]; [[Jer.35.8|Jer 35:8]]; [[Jer.35.14|Jer 35:14]]; [[Jer.35.16|Jer 35:16]]; [[Jer.35.19|Jer 35:19]]; [[1Chr.2.55|1Chr 2:55]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקִּינִים‎</span> (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵינִי‎</span>) are said to be descended from <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***„mmath***</u></abbr>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲבִי בֵיתרֵֿכָב‎</span>. — On the asceticism of different tribes compare [[BDB#Diod|Diod]]<sup>xix.94</sup> (Nabataeans), Palmer<sup>Desert 432</sup> (***Kheibari*** Jews in Arabia); see also [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]]<sup>Stellung Israel Zu d, Freemden 80</sup>. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** (perhaps= **a**, so Emey<sup>Entstehung 147</sup>) in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְכִּיָּה בֶןרֿ‎</span> [[Neh.3.14|Neh 3:14]]. 

**2.** in Benjamin, [[2Sam.4.2|2Sam 4:2]] (<span class="bdbLangGreek">πηχαβ</span>), v[[2Sam.4.3|2Sam 4:3]] v[[2Sam.4.6|2Sam 4:6]] v[[2Sam.4.9|2Sam 4:9]] (<span class="bdbLangGreek">πεκχα</span>; [[BDB#A|A]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Πηχαβ</span> in all).
